ai-patthana15.64:0.2_0: The Order of the Dhamma: allows unintelligent in the Khadehaka, and constantly preciously for him.
ai-patthana15.64:0.3_0: doing what is good and wholesome,
ai-patthana15.64:1.1_0: Not sovereignty in the fine-material sphere, nor in the formless.
ai-patthana15.64:1.1_1: Not in the formless realm, or in the sphere of the skillful.
ai-patthana15.64:1.1_3: What is not the reason for two reasons.
ai-patthana15.64:2.1_0: Not in the formless, or in the sphere of the unskillful. There is no cause or condition for the sake of the fine-material sphere.
ai-patthana15.64:2.1_3: What are the two kinds of temperament?
